constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL Name: MC1  Maldens and Coombe
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

description: Erection of rear and side dormer roof extensions and installation of 2 front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion
decision_conditions: The erection of rear and side dormer roof extensions and the installation of 2 front rooflights to facilitate a loft conversion falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B and C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Full details, with calculations, of the proposed extraction system would be required to demonstrate compliance with "Control of Odour and Noise from Commercial Kitchen Exhaust Systems" published by EMAQ+ dated September 2018. This replaced the previous Defra guidance, now withdrawn.Such a submission would have to include, where applicable, details of:(i) The extract fan, silencers, anti-vibration mounts, high velocity cowl, filters, odour abatement and any other items of plant;(ii) The velocity of the air at final discharge and duct termination height and location(iii) The retention time of gases in the carbon filters (where applicable);(iv) A maintenance schedule(v) Completion of an odour risk assessment
